waysToSayGoodbye.explanation: This phrase is a formal and polite way to say goodbye. It is often used when parting ways for an extended period or when you may not see the person for a while.
This phrase is a casual and friendly way to say goodbye. It is commonly used among friends, classmates, or people of similar age groups.
This phrase is an informal way to say goodbye. It is similar to 'See you later' in English and is commonly used in casual settings.

This phrase is used in more formal situations, such as leaving a workplace or a meeting. It translates to 'I apologize for leaving before you' and is a polite way to say goodbye while expressing respect.
This phrase is used to say 'Goodnight' or 'Sleep well' when parting ways in the evening or before going to bed. It is a polite and considerate way to bid farewell at the end of the day.
